text: Futhi (khumbula) ngenkathi uMose ethi kubantu bakhe (Oh bantwana bakwa-Israyeli!) “Khumbulani ububele bukaMvelinqangi kunina ngenkathi enisindisa ebantwini baFaro ababenihlupha ngesijeziso esinzima futhi babebulala amadodana enu beshiya abesifazane benu bephila futhi kulokho kwakunesivivinyo esikhulu esivela eNkosini yenu”
